releaseNotes: This update includes bug fixes and improvements to enhance your experience with our App.
description:
Crypto.com is trusted by over 80 million users worldwide. Buy and sell 350+ crypto, and earn up to 5.25% p.a. on your crypto with us. Trade safely and securely with industry-leading compliance and security certifications, and proof of reserves.

Crypto Trading
• Buy and sell popular crypto, including Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH), using 20+ fiat currencies or credit/debit card.
• Trade crypto weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly, by setting up automatic purchases.

Crypto.com Visa Card
• Spend or withdraw your funds with your Crypto.com Visa Card anywhere Visa is accepted.
• Up to 5% back in CRO on all spend.
• Music, movie and shopping subscription rebates with selected cards.
• Unlimited access to 1,000+ airport lounges with selected cards.
• 10% rewards on selected travel websites.*
• Enjoy attractive interbank exchange rates.
• No hidden fees for withdrawals.**

Rewards+
• Unlock exclusive perks with as little as $100 in trading volume per year. Level up through our 20-tier rewards system.
• Higher Earn Plus Bonuses: Enjoy up to extra 5% p.a. rewards on 3-month stablecoin allocations. 

Crypto Earn
• Earn up to 5.25% p.a. on your crypto holdings.
• Put your holdings to work with many supported tokens and coins, including 40+ crypto and stablecoins.

Missions
• Complete exciting Missions to earn Diamonds.
• Redeem your Diamonds for Mystery Boxes to get rewards of up to US$1,100 of CRO.

Track Crypto
• Track 250+ crypto with Price Alerts and Target Price notifications.

Crypto.com Pay
• Pay with 30+ crypto, including Cronos (CRO), Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin (BTC), Polkadot (DOT), and Dogecoin (DOGE), and earn rewards.
• Instant settlements with zero gas fees.
• Shop at 150+ top brands and earn up to 10% back in CRO.
• Up to 4% back in CRO when you spend with Travala, Alternative Airlines, and hotels.
• Up to 2.5% rewards on airline gift cards.

*These offers are launched by Crypto.com independently, and there is no partnership between Crypto.com and the merchants in these offers. Crypto.com has the sole discretion to modify these offers at any time.
** ATM bank fees may apply. Limits apply. Visit Crypto.com for details.

The availability of the products and services on the Crypto.com App is subject to jurisdictional limitations. Crypto.com may not offer certain products, features and/or services on the Crypto.com App in certain jurisdictions due to potential or actual regulatory restrictions.

Cryptoassets are volatile investments that involve a high degree of risk and returns are subject to Capital Gains Tax. Cryptoassets are not regulated by the FCA in the UK, and users are not eligible for FSCS protection or recourse from the Financial Ombudsman Service.

Foris DAX MT Limited, a company incorporated in Malta with Company number (C88392) trading under the name “Crypto.com” via the Crypto.com app is licensed as a Class 3 Virtual Financial Assets Service Provider by the Malta Financial Services Authority. Foris DAX MT Limited is authorised to provide the following VFA services: 1. execution of orders on behalf of other persons; 2. dealing on own account; and 3. custodian or nominee services to experienced and non-experienced investors.

For EEA/UK customers: The Crypto.com Visa Card is issued and promoted by Foris MT Limited pursuant to its Visa Principal Member (Issuing) license. Foris MT Limited is a limited liability company incorporated in Malta, with company registration number: C 90348 and registered office at Level 7, Spinola Park, Triq Mikiel Ang Borg, SPK 1000, St. Julians, Malta, duly authorised by the Malta Financial Services Authority as a Financial Institutions licenced to issue electronic money under the 3rd Schedule to the Financial Institutions Act (Electronic Money Institutions).

Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all of the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you are unlikely to be protected if something goes wrong. Take 2 mins to learn more (https://crypto.com/document/risk_summary_uk).
